Package shapes3d.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContourScale
    This interface provides the method required to define the scale factor to be applied to the contour at various points along the extrusion's length.
    I_PathGen
    This interface defines the methods need to define a parametric path in 3D.
    I_RadiusGen  
    Path
    This interface defines the methods required to define the path of an extruded shape.
    VectorConstants
    This interface has been included to add various constants used in the Rot class but are not part of the PVector class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bezier2D
    This class is used to represent a single Bezier curve of degree >= 2 in 2D space.
    C_IBeam
    Pre-fabricated class that creates an I beam contour.
    C_Rod
    Pre-fabricated class that creates an rod (symmetrical) contour.
    Contour
    Extend this class to create your own contour shapes.
    CS_ConstantScale
    Pre-fabricated class that creates a constant scale control for the contour of a shape along its path.
    CS_LinearScale
    Pre-fabricated class that creates a linear tapered scale control for the contour of a shape along its path.
    MeshSection
    Utility class to specify which part of the mesh to be drawn.
    Messages  
    P_Bezier3D
    This class is used to represent a single Bezier curve of degree >= 2 in 3D space.
    P_BezierSpline
    This class defines a Bezier spline in 3D space that passes through a set of given points (called knots).
    P_LinearPath
    Pre- fabricated class that creates an linear path between two points for the shape.
    Rot
    This class implements rotations in a three-dimensional space.
    RotOrder
    This class is a utility representing a rotation order specification for Cardan or Euler angles specification.
    Textures
    This class is used to load bitmap files and create images.
    Triangulator  
    TubeRadius
    This class is used to determine the radius of a tube shape along its length as determined by the parametric variable t.
    UV
    Simple class to hold texture coordinates.
    VectorUtil
    This class is used internally by the library and provides some additional methods not covered in the PVector class.
